entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
